value.title: Conditional formatting in Power BI - Power BI Tips & Tricks #28
value.excerpt: Do you know how to change the color of your charts or tables based on a value or measure? In this video I will show you how to do conditional formatting in bar charts and tables.  Link to Power BI file: https://gofile.me/2kEOD/xY8rZftHU   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Convert Epoch/ Unix time to datetime in Power Query in one step!

value.title: Convert JSON strings to tables in Power Query/ Power BI

value.title: COVID Vaccine Tracker Part1: Get data from github and schedule refresh it
value.excerpt: This video is part 1 of the upcoming series: How to create a Vaccine tracker.  In Part 1 we will get the data from Github, publish it to a PPU workspace (we will need that later) and show you how to schedule refresh it and what to do if the option is not available. value.title: Create an excel survey and view results live with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #09:
